sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2018-10-01 10:15:03.568989 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2019-06-20T19:40:26.788-04:00.

body.ab: The catastrophe of the <lb n="c56-0014__main__24"/> tree excited my extreme astonish<lb n="c56-0014__main__25"/>ment <del next="#c56-0014.12" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2264"/>and<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2264"/><del next="#c56-0014.13" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2269" xml:id="c56-0014.12"/>caused<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2269"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>induced<del next="#c56-0014.14" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2282" xml:id="c56-0014.13"/>me to aply wi<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2282"/><del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2286"/>ith<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2286"/><lb n="c56-0014__main__26"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2291" xml:id="c56-0014.14"/>fresh di<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2291"/>ligence to the study of <lb n="c56-0014__main__27"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2298"/>chemistry<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2298"/>natural philosophy which promised an ex<lb n="c56-0014__main__28"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2310"/>clamatio<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2310"/> planation of th<mdel>e</mdel>ise sort of<lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__1"/> ph√¶nonema. On Elizabeth and <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__2"/> Clerval it produced a <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0015__Pt1__main__d2e2341"/>di<del eID="c56-0015__Pt1__main__d2e2341"/> very different <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__3"/> effect. They admired the beauty <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__4"/> of the storm without wishing to <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__5"/> analyze its causes. Henry said that <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__6"/> the Fairies and giants were at <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__7"/> war and Elizabeth attempted <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__8"/> a picture of it.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__9"/> As I grew older my attempts <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__10"/> in science were of a higher nature. <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__11"/> I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0015__Pt1__main__d2e2370"/>endeavou<del eID="c56-0015__Pt1__main__d2e2370"/> produced little earthquakes <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__12"/> and tried every kind of combination <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__13"/> of gasses <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0015__Pt1__main__d2e2378"/>to<del eID="c56-0015__Pt1__main__d2e2378"/> and elements to ascertain <lb n="c56-0015__Pt1__main__14"/> the results.<gap quantity="16" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><gap quantity="3" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__4"/><mdel>An</mdel><mdel>d</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>Among other questions suggested by natural objects I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2419"/>as<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2419"/> eagerly enquired of my father <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__5"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2427"/>what<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2427"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the nature & the origin of thunder and lightening. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2440"/>was.<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2440"/> He <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__6"/> replied, electricity; describing at the same <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__7"/> time the effect of that power. He <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2449"/>made<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2449"/>constructed<lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__8"/> a small electrical machine and exhi<lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__9"/>bited a few experiments and made a <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__10"/> kite with a wire & string <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2473"/>and<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2473"/>which drew down <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__11"/> that fluid from the clouds.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__12"/> This last <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2486"/>blow<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2486"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2489"/>st<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2489"/> stroke compleated <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__13"/> the overthrow of Cornelius Agrippa, Albertus <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__14"/> Magnus and Paracelsus, who had so long <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__15"/> reigned the lords of my imagination. But <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__16"/> by some fatality I did not feel enclined to <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__17"/> commence any modern system and this <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__18"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2508"/>inclination<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2508"/>disinclination was influenced by the following <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__19"/> circumstance.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__20"/> My father expressed a wish that I <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__21"/> should attend a course of lectures upon <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__22"/> natural philosophy, to which I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>cheerfullyconsented and <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__23"/>one evening that I spent in town at the <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__24"/> house of Clerval's father I heard that <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__25"/> M<shi rend="sup">r</shi> ‚Äî was lef at met M. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2558"/>O P<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2558"/> a proficient <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__26"/> in Chemistry who left the company at <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__27"/> an early hour to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2566"/>h<del eID="c56-0009__Pt2__main__d2e2566"/> give his lecture upon <lb n="c56-0009__Pt2__main__28"/>tha<mdel>n</mdel>t science enquiring as he went out<lb n="c56-0010__main__1"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2596"/>if any one would him I went<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2596"/><del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2604"/>but<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2604"/>Some accident prevented my attending the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2609"/>series of<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2609"/> these lectures<lb n="c56-0010__main__2"/><del next="#c56-0010.03" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2616"/>this lecture was unfortunately nearly the<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2616"/>until <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2621"/>they were nearly over <del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2621"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2624"/>they<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2624"/> it was nearly finihsed. The<lb n="c56-0010__main__3"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2630" xml:id="c56-0010.03"/>last<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2630"/>lecture which I attended being thus <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2635"/>the<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2635"/> almost the last <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2638"/>in his<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2638"/> in his course <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>was entirely incomprehensible to me. ‚Äì the professor talked <lb n="c56-0010__main__4"/> with the greatest fluency of potassium &<lb n="c56-0010__main__5"/> Boron <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2661"/>zinc bismuth<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2661"/> ‚Äì of sulphats and oxids <lb n="c56-0010__main__6"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2666"/>and displayed so many<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2666"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2672"/>words<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2672"/>terms to which <lb n="c56-0010__main__7"/> I could <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2681"/>not<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2681"/> affix <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2686"/>any<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2686"/>no idea: <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2693"/>that<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2693"/> I was <lb n="c56-0010__main__8"/> disgusted with <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2699"/>the appearance<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2699"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2702"/>of<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2702"/> a science <lb n="c56-0010__main__9"/> that appeared to me to contain only words.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0010__main__10"/> From this time untill I went to <lb n="c56-0010__main__11"/> Colledge I entirely neglected my formerly <lb n="c56-0010__main__12"/> adored study of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2718"/>chemistry<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2718"/>the science of natural philosophy although I still <lb n="c56-0010__main__13"/> read with delight Pliny and Buffons <lb n="c56-0010__main__14"/> authors <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2734"/>that stood about on a par<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2734"/><mdel>ar</mdel><mdel>of</mdel><lb n="c56-0010__main__15"/> in my estimation of nearly equal interest & utility.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0010__main__16"/> My <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2759"/>studies<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2759"/>occupations at this age were <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2766"/>th<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2766"/> principally the <lb n="c56-0010__main__17"/> mathematics, <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2772"/>which I delighted in an<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2772"/> and most <lb n="c56-0010__main__18"/> of the branches of study appertaining <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2777"/>th<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2777"/> to that <lb n="c56-0010__main__19"/> science. I was also busily employed in learning <lb n="c56-0010__main__20"/> languages Latin was <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>already familiar to me and I began to <lb n="c56-0010__main__21"/> read without the help of the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2801"/>dictionary<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2801"/>lexicon some of the <lb n="c56-0010__main__22"/> easiest greek authors. ‚ÄìI also understood English&<lb n="c56-0010__main__23"/> german perfectly: th<del rend="overwritten" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2816"/>ese<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2816"/>is<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2821"/>are<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2821"/>is list of my accom<lb n="c56-0010__main__24"/>plishments at <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2837"/>that<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2837"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2840"/>time<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2840"/><mdel>th</mdel><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0010__main__d2e2848"/>e period<del eID="c56-0010__main__d2e2848"/> the age of and you may <lb n="c56-0010__main__25"/> conceive that my hours were fully employd <lb n="c56-0010__main__26"/> in acquiring and maintaining a knowledge <lb n="c56-0010__main__27"/> of this various literature.<gap quantity="14" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__15"/>As I before mentioned my brothers <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__16"/> were much younger than myself. <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__17"/> Ernest the second of our family was five<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__18"/> Another task <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0015__Pt2__main__d2e2889"/>soon<del eID="c56-0015__Pt2__main__d2e2889"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>also devolved upon <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__19"/> me when I became the instructor <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__20"/> of my brothers. Ernest was five years <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__21"/> younger than myself, and was my <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__22"/> principal pupil. He had been aflicted <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__23"/> with ill health from his infancy <mdel>&</mdel>thro which<lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__24"/> Elizabeth and I had been his constant <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__25"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0015__Pt2__main__d2e2927"/>m<del eID="c56-0015__Pt2__main__d2e2927"/> nurses <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0015__Pt2__main__d2e2930"/>I<del eID="c56-0015__Pt2__main__d2e2930"/> his disposition was gentle but <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__26"/> he was incapable any severe appli<lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__27"/>cation. William the younge<mdel>er</mdel>st of our <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__28"/> family was quite a child and the <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__29"/> most beautiful little fellow in the <lb n="c56-0015__Pt2__main__30"/> world, his lively blue eyes dimpled cheeks<lb n="c56-0016__main__1"/> and <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0016__main__d2e2967"/>affectionate<del eID="c56-0016__main__d2e2967"/> endearing manners <lb n="c56-0016__main__2"/> inspired the tenderest affection. Such <lb n="c56-0016__main__3"/> was our domestic circle from which <lb n="c56-0016__main__4"/> care and pain seemed for ever banish<lb n="c56-0016__main__5"/>ed. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0016__main__d2e2983"/>f<del eID="c56-0016__main__d2e2983"/> My father directed our studies <lb n="c56-0016__main__6"/> and my mother partook of our <lb n="c56-0016__main__7"/> enjoyments. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0016__main__d2e2993"/>we were all equal<del eID="c56-0016__main__d2e2993"/><lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__1"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0016__left_margin__d2e3006"/>we none<del eID="c56-0016__left_margin__d2e3006"/>neither of <lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__2"/> us possessed <lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__3"/> an envied <lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__4"/> preheminence <lb n="c56-0016__left_margin__5"/> over the other the <lb n="c56-0016__main__8"/> voice of command was never heard <lb n="c56-0016__main__9"/> among us but mutual affection <lb n="c56-0016__main__10"/> engaged us all to comply with,&to<lb n="c56-0016__main__11"/> obey the slightest desire of each <lb n="c56-0016__main__12"/> other.
